targets.expr:
label_replace(
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      label_replace(
        container_net_tcp_successful_connects_total{cluster_name=~"$cluster", container_id=~"/k8s/${source_namespace}/.*"},
        "source_container", "$4", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
      ),
      "source_pod", "$3", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
    ),
    "source_namespace", "$2", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
  ),
  "source_controller", "$1", "source_pod", "(.+?)(-[^-]+)?$"
)
* on (actual_destination, cluster_name) group_left(
    destination_namespace,
    destination_pod,
    destination_container,
    destination_ip,
    destination_port,
    destination_controller
) (
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      label_replace(
          label_replace(
              label_replace(
                  label_replace(
                      label_replace(
                          container_net_tcp_listen_info{cluster_name=~"$cluster", container_id=~"/k8s/${destination_namespace}/.*"},
                          "actual_destination", "$1", "listen_addr", "(.*)"
                      ),
                      "destination_namespace", "$2", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
                  ),
                  "destination_pod", "$3", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
              ),
              "destination_container", "$4", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
          ),
          "destination_ip", "$1", "actual_destination", "([^:]+):.*"
      ),
      "destination_port", "$1", "actual_destination", "[^:]+:([0-9]+)"
    ),
  "destination_controller", "$1", "destination_pod", "(.+?)(-[^-]+)?$"
  )
)

label_replace(
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      label_replace(
        container_net_tcp_successful_connects_total{cluster_name=~"$cluster", container_id=~"/k8s/${source_namespace}/.*"},
        "source_container", "$4", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
      ),
      "source_pod", "$3", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
    ),
    "source_namespace", "$2", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
  ),
  "source_controller", "$1", "source_pod", "(.+?)(-[^-]+)?$"
)
* on (actual_destination, cluster_name) group_left(
    destination_namespace,
    destination_pod,
    destination_container,
    destination_ip,
    destination_port,
    destination_controller
) (
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      label_replace(
          label_replace(
              label_replace(
                  label_replace(
                      label_replace(
                          container_net_tcp_listen_info{cluster_name=~"$cluster", container_id=~"/k8s/${destination_namespace}/.*"},
                          "actual_destination", "$1", "listen_addr", "(.*)"
                      ),
                      "destination_namespace", "$2", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
                  ),
                  "destination_pod", "$3", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
              ),
              "destination_container", "$4", "container_id", "/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)/([^/]+)"
          ),
          "destination_ip", "$1", "actual_destination", "([^:]+):.*"
      ),
      "destination_port", "$1", "actual_destination", "[^:]+:([0-9]+)"
    ),
  "destination_controller", "$1", "destination_pod", "(.+?)(-[^-]+)?$"
  )
)
